document_data.name: Plaguechanged Thing
document_data.mainbody: The '''Plaguechanged Thing''' was a [[plaguechanged]] creature that lived in the caverns below [[Westgate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The Plaguechanged Thing was a blob of protoplasm about {{SI|1|mile|k|long=yes}} long.
document_data.Abilities: The Plaguechanged Thing had incredible [[psionic]] abilities thanks to the mutations caused in its brain by the [[Spellplague]], but its powers were limited to the confines of its lair.
document_data.History: The Plaguechanged Thing was born as a consequence of the Spellplague of the {{YearlinkName|1385}}. It was originally a [[dwarf]] excavator, but the extreme alterations of its body left it trapped in the caves below Westgate. The Plaguechanged Thing was still alive as of [[1479 DR]].
